content:
ConBee III goes through certification​

	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						Smart-Home-Gateway: ConBee III durchläuft die Zertifizierung
					
				

				Smart-Home-Enthusiasten haben sicher schon von den ConBee-Sticks gehört. ConBee ist ein USB-Adapter, der als Brücke zwischen einem Computer ...

				
					
						
							
						
					
					stadt-bremerhaven.de
				
			
		
	





	
	
		
		
			Version 3 of the Smart Home stick has just been approved by the certification authorities go through, there is also a mention of the support of the upcoming stick in the deCONZ-Rest plugin. On the other hand, it is still unclear what exactly you want to realize –, although a lot has happened in the last few years, especially with a view to smart home standards such as Matter and protocols like thread.
		
		Klikni za razširitev
author: LjuboB
